card.name: Acastus Kolya
card.property: Obstacles with an ambush text cost power -1 to play while Acastus Kolya is assigned. Each time a prepared ambush obstacle triggers, choose one: Draw a card; or ready Acastus Kolya.

card.name: Cordesh
card.property: During your turn (as the hero player), Cordesh becomes a Tok'ra support character. Stop Cordesh - Draw a card. Destroy Cordesh - Ready an adversary or a character.

card.name: Devout Prior
card.property: Each time you revive Devout Prior, you may look at the top three cards of your opponent's mission pile. If you do, return them in the order of your choice on that pile. Then, you may swap a blockaded mission with the top card of your opponent's mission pile.

card.name: Edrekh
card.property: When you play Edrekh, you may pay 1 power. If you do, destroy a ready support character, and Edrekh gets difficulty +1 and revive cost -3 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Eighth
card.property: While Eighth is stopped, missions get difficulty +1. Stop Eighth - Gain 2 power. At the end of the current mission, destroy Eighth.

card.name: Ellia
card.property: Ellia gets Combat +3 while there is a Wraith obstacle or a Disease obstacle at the current mission. When you score Ellia, you may destroy a support character.

card.name: Fifth
card.property: While Fifth is assigned, every third Replicator obstacle you play each mission may be played at no cost. Stop Fifth - Stop Samantha Carter.

card.name: Gray Alien Intruder
card.property: Gray Alien Intruder costs power -1 to play for each prepared ambush obstacle. Gray Alien Intruder gets difficulty +1 for each prepared ambush obstacle that has been triggered this mission.

card.name: Hive Keeper
card.property: Failure: You may pay Hive Keeper's revive cost with cards from the top of your opponent's deck (place those cards in their discard pile).

card.name: Kelore
card.property: While Kelore is ready, Culture missions get difficulty +1.

card.name: Ladon Radim
card.property: Ladon Radim costs power -2 to play if an adversary was destroyed this turn. Stop Ladon Radim - Gain 2 power. Your opponent may discard a random card. If they do, they gain 2 power.

card.name: Neeva Casol
card.property: Outlaw. When you play Neeva Casol, choose a team character. They are blocked from the current mission. If there is a complication, they are also stopped. When you score Neeva Casol, incapacitate the chosen character.

card.name: Nerus
card.property: Stop Nerus, drain 4 - Each other adversary gets Culture +1, Science +1, Combat +1,and Ingenuity +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Otho
card.property: Otho gets difficulty +1 for each plot counter on him. At the end of your opponent's power phase, gain 1 power for each plot counter on Otho. Failure: Place a plot counter on Otho.

card.name: Pranos
card.property: While Pranos is ready, Combat missions get difficulty +1.

card.name: Shen Xiaoyi
card.property: Political vassal. Shen Xiaoyi gets difficulty +1 for each failed mission this turn. When you score Shen Xiaoyi, your opponent loses 2 power.

card.name: Vengeful Prior
card.property: While Vengeful Prior is assigned, each time you play a complication, you may place a number of Wound tokens on an assigned character equal to the number of complications at the current mission.

card.name: Wraith Servitor
card.property: Dominion. Wraith vassal. Failure: Stop a character. Then, your opponent must drain 1 for each stopped character.

card.name: Bates
card.property: Support characters that are neither Atlantis nor SGC cost power +1 to play. While you control a support character that is neither Atlantis nor SGC, Bates gets skills -1.

card.name: Cha'ra
card.property: Each time you boost a Jaffa character, you may pay 1 power. If you do, that character gets an additional skills +1.

card.name: Frigg
card.property: When you play Frigg, you may stop her and pay 2 power. If you do, ready up to two team characters.

card.name: Gibson
card.property: Stop and destroy Gibson - The current mission gets: "Success: An additional power phase occurs immediately."

card.name: Jack O'Neill
card.property: Jack O'Neill can't become blocked.

card.name: Jeannie Miller
card.property: When you play Jeannie Miller, you may destroy a non-Disease Science obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Kostenko
card.property: Kostenko costs power -1 to play for each mission you played this turn. When Kostenko is destroyed, you may pay 1 power. If you do, stop a ready adversary.

card.name: Latal
card.property: Latal gets skills +1 for each obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Martin Lloyd
card.property: Each time you place an event in your discard pile, you may stop Martin Lloyd. If you do, take that event into hand.

card.name: Niam
card.property: To assign Niam, stop another support character. Failure: If Niam is a support character, he permanently becomes a Replicator adversary with revive cost 5. (He is now a villain card and loses the character and support traits.)

card.name: Peter Kavanagh
card.property: Peter Kavanagh is blocked during the first mission played each turn. Peter Kavanagh gets skills -1 while there was a failed mission this turn.

card.name: Siler
card.property: While your opponent is choosing one or more characters, Siler gets the team trait in addition to his other traits. Each time your opponent is choosing one or more characters, if Siler is one of the characters that could be chosen, they must choose Siler first.

card.name: Stackhouse
card.property: Each time you play a Combat mission, you may stop Stackhouse. If you do, the mission gets: "Success: Destroy a villain ship."

card.name: Svetlana Markov
card.property: Grit. Svetlana Markov costs power -1 to play for each failed mission this turn.

card.name: Talmek
card.property: Stop and destroy Talmek - Look at the top five cards of your deck. Place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck. Then, draw two cards.

card.name: Teal'c
card.property: Each time you assign Teal'c, choose an adversary. They can't be revived until the end of the current mission. Success or Failure: You may pay 2 power. If you do, ready Teal'c.

card.name: Walter Harriman
card.property: Walter Harriman gets Combat +1 and Ingenuity +1 while a hero ship is assigned.

card.name: Wood
card.property: Wood gets skills +1 for each card you have drawn or taken into hand from your deck during the current mission.

card.name: Aiden Ford
card.property: Pisces: Each time you boost Aiden Ford, your opponent must destroy an obstacle unless they discard a card. Pisces and Orion, Pay 1 power, discard an Atlantis character card - Aiden Ford gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission. This counts as a boost (it triggers his first ability).

card.name: Alicia Vega
card.property: Pisces: The first obstacle your opponent plays each turn costs power +1. Scorpius: The first complication your opponent plays each turn costs power +1. Pisces and Scorpius: Alicia Vega gets: "Success: Destroy an assigned villain ship."

card.name: Beowulf
card.property: Each time Beowulf earns a glyph, you may take a villain card in your opponent's discard pile and place it face up beneath Beowulf. Copies of the cards placed beneath Beowulf this way cost power +1 to play for each glyph Beowulf has. Libra or Scorpius: Beowulf gets Combat +2 while assigned with an Asgard ship.

card.name: Daniel Jackson
card.property: Gemini or Pisces: Daniel Jackson gets Combat +2 while assigned with Teal'c. Each other team character with a glyph gets Culture +1 while Daniel Jackson is assigned.

card.name: Evan Lorne
card.property: Each time Evan Lorne earns a different glyph, you may destroy an adversary or a prepared ambush obstacle.

card.name: George Hammond
card.property: George Hammond gets experience +1 for each battle counter on him. Libra or Orion: George Hammond gets: "Victory: Place a battle counter on George Hammond. You can do this only once each turn, and only if there are fewer than five battle counters on him."

card.name: Heimdall
card.property: Gemini or Scorpius: Each time you boost a character, you may draw a card. Gemini and Scorpius: Each time you boost a character, you may discard a card. If you do, gain 1 power.

card.name: Ishta
card.property: Gemini: Each time your opponent prepares an ambush obstacle, they lose 1 power. Scorpius: Each time a prepared ambush obstacle triggers, your opponent loses 1 power. Gemini and Scorpius: Obstacles cost power +1 to play.

card.name: Jack O'Neill
card.property: Gemini or Libra: Jack O'Neill gets Science +2 while assigned with Samantha Carter. Each other team character with a glyph gets Ingenuity +1 while Jack O'Neill is assigned.

card.name: John Sheppard
card.property: The first time each turn that John Sheppard becomes blocked, place a clue counter on him. Scorpius or Triangulum, Destroy a clue counter on John Sheppard - John Sheppard gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Laurence Conner
card.property: Pisces or Triangulum: Laurence Conner gets: "Success: You may ready any number of assigned support characters whose total cost is equal to or lower than the total number of villain cards and complications at the current mission."

card.name: Makepeace
card.property: Gemini or Orion: Each time you play a gear, you may discard a hero card. If you do, Makepeace gets Ingenuity +1 until the end of the turn. Gemini and Orion: Each time you use his first ability, Makepeace gets skills +1 until the end of the turn instead of Ingenuity +1.

card.name: Martouf
card.property: Each time you assign Martouf, if he has at least three glyphs, choose another team character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. When Martouf earns his sixth glyph, if each glyph he has is different and he has no lore tokens, you win the game.

card.name: Richard WOoldey
card.property: While Richard Woolsey is ready, he gets: "Pay 1 power, move a glyph from Richard Woolsey to another team character - Search your deck for a gear or a support character card, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck."

card.name: "Rod" McKay
card.property: Each time you assign "Rod" McKay to a mission that has a glyph matching one of his, you may discard a card. If you do, "Rod" McKay gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Samantha Carter
card.property: Libra or Orion: Samantha Carter gets Culture +2 while assigned with Daniel Jackson. Each other team character with a glyph gets Science +1 while Samantha Carter is assigned.

card.name: Teal'c
card.property: Orion or Pisces: Teal'c gets Ingenuity +2 while assigned with Jack O'Neill. Each other team character with a glyph gets Combat +1 while Teal'c is assigned.

card.name: Tolinev
card.property: Tolinev gets experience +1 for each face down card beneath her. Failure: If there are fewer cards beneath Tolinev than the number of Triangulum glyphs your characters have, you may place a card from your hand face down beneath her.

card.name: Vallarin
card.property: Libra: While Vallarin is assigned, obstacles cost power +1 to play for each failed mission this turn. Gemini and Libra: Vallarin gets skills +1.

card.name: Actionable Intel
card.property: This event costs power -1 to play for each card in your opponent's villain score pile. The current mission gets: "Success: Destroy an adversary."

card.name: Against All Odds
card.property: Until the end of the current mission, obstacles get difficulty +1 and complications cost power -1 to play. The current mission gets: "Success: Ready each assigned character."

card.name: Always Up for Action
card.property: To play this event, stop a character. Ready another character, gear, or hero ship.

card.name: Bigger Explosions
card.property: To play this event, destroy a gear. Destroy an obstacle that costs less than the destroyed gear.

card.name: Close Call
card.property: The current mission gets: "Success: If the total skills contributed are equal to the total difficulty of the mission, you gain power equal to the mission's experience."

card.name: Grand Council Meeting
card.property: To play this event, stop a Tok'ra character. Gain power equal to the stopped character's Culture. if at least one card in your opponent's villain score pile is Goa'uld, gain 1 additional power.

card.name: Idyllic First Contact
card.property: This event costs power -1 to play if there was a successful mission this turn. Until the end of the current mission, as long as there is exactly one team character among the assigned characters, that mission gets difficulty -2.

card.name: Kawoosh!
card.property: Reveal one card from the top of your deck for each ready team character. For each villain card revealed this way, discard it and gain 1 power. For each hero card revealed this way, take it into hand and your opponent draws a card.

card.name: Obvious Reference
card.property: To play this event, stop a hero ship. Draw a number of cards equal to the stopped ship's firepower.

card.name: Pulling Rank
card.property: Unblock a character. If they are SGC or Atlantis, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready them. Draw a card.

card.name: Respect for the Fallen
card.property: Gain 1 power for each support character that was destroyed this turn. Gain 1 power and draw a card for each failed mission this turn.

card.name: Resupply
card.property: Search your deck or discard pile for a gear card, reveal it, and take it into hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

card.name: Secret Objective
card.property: The current mission gets: "Success: You may play a gear at no cost" and "Failure: Your opponent destroys a support character or a gear."

card.name: Time Travelers
card.property: You can't play any more missions this turn. The current mission gets: "Success: For each assigned team character, gain 1 power at the end of your next power phase."

card.name: Colt 1911 Pistol
card.property: Stop this gear, block a team character from the current mission - Choose an adversary. Wound them once. You may ready them. They are blocked from the current mission.

card.name: Intersearcher
card.property: Pay 2 power - Look at the top card of your deck, then place it on the top or bottom of that deck. You may discard a card. If you do, repeat this activated ability. If you don't, draw a card.

card.name: Mark IX Nuclear Bomb
card.property: Stop and purge this gear, pay 3 power - Destroy an obstacle at the current mission and choose one: destroy each complication; or remove the failure text on each remaining obstacle.

card.name: Russian-Controlled Gate
card.property: Missions cost you power -1 to play. (Your opponent still gains power as normal when you choose to continue.)

card.name: Surveillance Van
card.property: Each time your opponent draws a card during the mission phase, they must reveal it to you. Stop this gear - You and your opponent both draw a card.

card.name: Tok'ra Tunnels
card.property: At the end of each power phase, take a hero card in your discard pile and place it face up beneath this gear. Purge this gear, pay 2 power - Shuffle the cards beneath this gear into your deck. You may take each Tok'ra card this would shuffle into your deck into hand instead.

card.name: Aegis of the Faithful
card.property: Dominion. When you play this obstacle, you may place a card from your villain score pile into your discard pile. If you do, gain power equal to that card's cost.

card.name: Blatant Plagiarism
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may choose up to three different character cards in your opponent's discard pile. Each character that has the same title as a chosen card is blocked.

card.name: Bold Proposal
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose two characters. They are blocked. Failure: Stop the chosen characters.

card.name: Capacitors Overload
card.property: Failure: Destroy a gear for each mission played so far this turn.

card.name: Censored Language
card.property: To play this obstacle, discard a card. Each support character whose cost is equal to the discarded card's is blocked.

card.name: Code Red
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play for each card in your villain score pile. Failure: Stop all characters.

card.name: Dark Vision
card.property: You can play this obstacle only if a Wraith adversary is assigned. When you play this obstacle, your opponent reveals the cards in their hand. Choose one of them for them to place on top of their deck. Failure: Your opponent must drain 2.

card.name: Disastrous First Contact
card.property: Failure: Destroy each assigned support character and each support character that was played during this mission.

card.name: Distracting Hallucination
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on an assigned or stopped character. They get skills -1, "to assign this character, discard a card," and "Success: destroy this obstacle."

card.name: DNA Conversion
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a team character and wound them once. Failure: Incapacitate the chosen character.

card.name: Double Trouble
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a character card in your opponent's discard pile. Stop a character with the same title as the chosen card.

card.name: Emergence
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may purge any number of Replicator cards from your discard pile. If you do, search your deck for a Replicator adversary whose cost is lower than the number of cards you purged this way, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Frantic Escape
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent loses 1 power for each other Replicator card at the current mission.

card.name: Gauntlet
card.property: Each Jaffa adversary that doesn't already have it gets Jaffa vassal and revive cost +1.

card.name: Imperious Preaching
card.property: You may play this obstacle at a Science or Combat mission. If you do, prepare this ambush. Failure: Gain 2 power. You may ready an Ori adversary. Ambush (Culture): Choose one: Gain 2 power; or ready an Ori adversary.

card.name: No Consequences
card.property: The game text of each obstacle at the current mission that is not titled "No Consequences" is blank. (This may result in some characters becoming unblocked. Obstacles still add their difficulty to the mission's, as normal.)

card.name: Obscure Reference
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may stop a villain ship. If you do, draw a number of cards equal to the stopped ship's firepower.

card.name: Painful Realization
card.property: Failure: You may discard a card. If you do, choose one: Stop a character whose cost is X or less; or gain X power. X is equal to one plus the cost of the discarded card.

card.name: Red Tape
card.property: When you play this obstacle, prepare this ambush. While this ambush obstacle is prepared, each mission costs your opponent power +1 to play for each other mission played before it this turn. Ambush (Culture/Ingenuity): You may pay 1 power. if you do, prepare this ambush.

card.name: Replicator Regeneration
card.property: You may play this obstacle at a Culture or Ingenuity mission. If you do, prepare this ambush. Failure: Replicator obstacles cost power -1 to play until the end of the turn. Ambush (Science): Replicator obstacles cost power -1 to play until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Re'tu Rebel Incursion
card.property: You may play this obstacle at a Culture or Combat mission. If you do, prepare this ambush. Failure: Complications cost power -1 to play until the end of the turn. Ambush (Ingenuity): You may play up to two complications at no cost.

card.name: Romantic Entanglements
card.property: To play this obstacle, choose two team characters that share the same statuses. Until the end of the current mission, each time one of the chosen characters' status changes, the other's does too to match it. (Statuses are: blocked, unblocked, ready, assigned, stopped, and incapacitated.)

card.name: Rushed Demonstration
card.property: To play this obstacle, drain 3. When you play this obstacle, chose a character. They are blocked.

card.name: Rushed Reconnaissance
card.property: To play this obstacle, drain 3. When you play this obstacle, chose a character. They are blocked.

card.name: Sir, Are You There?
card.property: When you play this obstacle, place it on a team character. While this obstacle is on a character, they are blocked and can't be unblocked. At the end of the current mission, destroy this obstacle.

card.name: Slashed Ambitions
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a character, then your opponent may discard any number of cards whose total cost is equal to or greater than that character's cost. If they don't, stop the chosen character.

card.name: Sodan Ambush
card.property: You may play this obstacle at a Science or Ingenuity mission. If you do, prepare this ambush. Failure: Stop a character. You may ready a Jaffa adversary. Ambush (Combat): Choose one: Stop a character; or ready a Jaffa adversary.

card.name: Spoiled Princess
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on a character. They get: "To assign this character or to use their activated ability, their owner must pay 1 power." When your opponent succeeds at a mission, destroy this obstacle.

card.name: Tense Dogfight
card.property: Victory: The current mission gets difficulty +1. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Combat): Choose a hero ship. It gets firepower -1 until the end of the current mission. Choose a villain ship. It gets firepower +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Uninterested
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may return a blocked support character to their owner's hand.

card.name: Unmasked
card.property: Dominion. When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned character. While a Wraith adversary is assigned, this obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each glyph on the chosen character.

card.name: Wraith Resilience
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned character. Failure: If the chosen character is a team character, incapacitate them. If the chosen character is a support character, destroy them and you may take this obstacle into hand.

card.name: Zombie Outbreak
card.property: This obstacle gets difficulty +2 if there are ten or more character cards in your opponent's discard pile.

card.name: Daedalus
card.property: When you assign this ship, at the end of the current mission, destroy it. Victory: You may pay 3 power. If you do, take this ship into hand.

card.name: Korolev F-302
card.property: This ship costs power -1 to play if there was a failed mission this turn. Victory: The next mission this turn gets difficulty -1.

card.name: Martin Lloyd's Ship
card.property: Success: You may place an assigned support character face down beneath this ship. You get 1 experience for each card beneath this ship.

card.name: Gray Alien Fighter
card.property: Victory: You may destroy this ship, if you do, the current mission gets difficulty +1 for each prepared ambush obstacle that has been triggered this mission.

card.name: Gray Alien Warship
card.property: This ship gets firepower +1 for each prepared ambush obstacle that has been triggered this mission. Victory: You may play up to two complications at no cost.

card.name: Leviathan
card.property: Each time you assign this ship, choose a hero ship. As long as this ship is assigned, the chosen ship is blocked. Victory: You may pay 2 power. If you do, destroy the chosen ship.

card.name: Niam
card.property: To assign Niam, stop a support character. This card can't be included in decks.
